books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A novel about the American Dream in the Roaring Twenties.

books.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
books.author: Douglas Adams
books.description: A comedic science fiction series about the misadventures of an unwitting human and his alien friend.

books.title: Maus
books.author: Art Spiegelman
books.description: A graphic novel recounting the experiences of the author's father during the Holocaust.
